Class CsiroVariableDao

  • java.lang.Object

public class CsiroVariableDao
extends java.lang.Object

    Guillaume Prevost

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public Variable find(java.lang.Integer id)
        Retrieve the climate variable in the database associated to a unique ID
        Parameters:
        id: - the unique ID of the required climate variable
        Returns:
        the climate variable associated to the given unique ID
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.NoResultException - if the search didn't return any result

      • find

        @Transactional
public Variable find(java.lang.String variableName)
              throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve the (unique) Climate variable matching a name
        Parameters:
        variableName: - the name of the variable to match
        Returns:
        the Climate variable from the database
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.NoResultException - if no variable matches the given name

      • getAll

        @Transactional
public java.util.List<Variable> getAll()
        Retrieve a list of all the different climate variables in the Database
        Returns:
        the list of all the different climate variables in the Database

      • getEngineeringModelVariables

        public java.util.List<Variable> getEngineeringModelVariables()
        Returns a list of all the different engineering model variables (static listing, not actually querying the database)
        Returns:
        the list of all the different engineering model variables in the Database
